1.0.1.name: wordpress/buddystream
1.0.1.description:
BuddyStream is a BuddyPress plugin that will synchronize all of your favorite Social Networks to the BuddyPress activity stream.

The plugin is easy to set-up, operate, and for your members to use. Each Social Network has its own admin panel where you can see which users are using the network, view cool statistics, and manage the advanced filtering settings.

Networks that the plugin currently supports: - Twitter - Flickr - Youtube - Last.fm - Location !NEW!

Requirements. - PHP 5.2.1+ - CURL - JSON - CRONJOB access

You may find FREE translations on: http://www.buddystream.net. For support and other feature request, please contact us on our website.
